rooms.description: Minimalist entrance with ample natural light and ventilation
Spacious living area featuring large windows for daylight; minimalistic decor in line with farmhouse aesthetics
Open dining space adjacent to kitchen; designed for casual gatherings and natural ventilation
Functional minimalist kitchen with integrated storage; includes large windows on the West side following Vastu principles for energy flow
Quiet study area that doubles as a library, featuring built-in shelves and abundant natural light from strategically placed openings

openings.description: Entry door positioned to maximize sunlight exposure in the morning while adhering to Vastu guidelines
Large windows in the living room ensuring natural light and cross ventilation
West-facing windows enhancing natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles
Strategically placed window for the study/library area to maximize daylight

rooms.description: Master bedroom featuring a balcony for natural light and fresh air
Guest bedroom with ample storage and minimalistic design
Additional bedroom integrated into the duplex layout ensuring privacy

openings.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom ensuring enhanced natural ventilation and daylight
Staircase providing access to the rooftop terrace

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace featuring minimalist outdoor furniture and a swimming pool

openings.description: Dedicated swimming pool area on the rooftop terrace
